MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG1& DG12  postcode areaa of Dumfries & Annan. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:30am to repair a fault on our overhead line network at Greenfield Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:06am on the 12th of March 2021.
